alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 2:36PM MST until December 22 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 85 mph on exposed ridgelines. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
